welcomeMessage: Congratulations on your new KAVIGAI account. We are excited to have you on board. KAVIGAI is a platform where you can: Set your goals and achieve it. Find mentors and get guidance from them. Be a mentor and motivate your mentees. Get great Connections. Establish a beautiful mentor-mentee relationship.
onboardMessage: Get the help you need at anytime from anywhere.
goalsMessage: Set your goals and achieve it. Find mentors and get guidance from them.
mentorMessage: Establish a beautiful mentor-mentee relationship. Get the help you need at anytime from anywhere.
ForgotPasswordMessage: You will receive an OTP through email. Enter that OTP to reset the password.
resetMessage: Password reset successfully. Please login with your new password.
